}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Alternate FCC IDs: [[FCC ID::PY309200107]] (06/30/2009), [[FCC ID::PY310100130]] (03/31/2010)
OEM SerComm (YNH00C-0.8-RA1)
A sticker on the box reads: "Connects to VIERA TVs by Panasonic Co. - Check for supported models at [http://www.netgear.com/wifitv www.netgear.com/wifitv]"
{{WiFiCert|WFA7461|07/01/2009}}
